button.script:
local agents = require('agents')

local function show_toast(title, description)
  agents.invokeTool("ui", "show_toast", { title = title, description = description }, function() end)
end

function widget:onPressed()
  local target = self or widget
  if target == nil then
    print("[submit.lua] widget reference missing; cannot handle onPressed")
    return
  end
  target:setSpinner(true)

  local emailWidget = getWidget("manager-email")
  local jobPostWidget = getWidget("job-post")
  local jobTitleWidget = getWidget("job-title")
  local managerNameWidget = getWidget("manager-name")

  if emailWidget == nil or jobPostWidget == nil or jobTitleWidget == nil or managerNameWidget == nil then
    target:setSpinner(false)
    show_toast("Missing inputs", "One or more input fields are not available.")
    return
  end

  local emailValue = emailWidget:getValue()
  local jobPostValue = jobPostWidget:getValue()
  local jobTitleValue = jobTitleWidget:getValue()
  local managerNameValue = managerNameWidget:getValue()

  local isEmpty = function(value)
    return value == nil or value == ""
  end

  if isEmpty(emailValue) or isEmpty(jobPostValue) or isEmpty(jobTitleValue) or isEmpty(managerNameValue) then
    target:setSpinner(false)
    show_toast("Missing inputs", "Please enter job title, manager name, email, and the job post details.")
    return
  end

  local emailStr = "" .. emailValue
  local jobPostStr = "" .. jobPostValue
  local jobTitleStr = "" .. jobTitleValue
  local managerNameStr = "" .. managerNameValue

  local payload = {
    manager_email = emailStr,
    job_post = jobPostStr,
    job_title = jobTitleStr,
    manager_name = managerNameStr,
  }

  agents.invokeTool(
    "job_post_submission",
    "submit_job_post",
    payload,
    function(error, response)
      widget:onSubmitComplete(error, response)
    end
  )
end

function widget:onSubmitComplete(error, response)
  local target = self or widget
  if target == nil then
    print("[submit.lua] widget reference missing; cannot handle onSubmitComplete")
    return
  end

  target:setSpinner(false)

  if error then
    show_toast("Save failed", tostring(error))
    return
  end

  local email = ""
  if response ~= nil and response.email ~= nil then
    email = tostring(response.email)
  end
  show_toast("Job post saved", "Logged job post for " .. email)
end
button.name: submit1
submit2
button.script:
local agents = require('agents')

local function show_toast(title, description)
  agents.invokeTool("ui", "show_toast", { title = title, description = description }, function() end)
end

function widget:onPressed()
  local target = self or widget
  if target == nil then
    print("[submit-resume-taskrunner.lua] widget reference missing; cannot handle onPressed")
    return
  end
  target:setSpinner(true)

  local emailWidget = getWidget("email")
  local resumeWidget = getWidget("resume")

  if emailWidget == nil or resumeWidget == nil then
    target:setSpinner(false)
    show_toast("Missing inputs", "One or more input fields are not available.")
    return
  end

  local emailValue = emailWidget:getValue()
  local resumeValue = resumeWidget:getValue()

  local isEmpty = function(value)
    return value == nil or value == ""
  end

  if isEmpty(emailValue) or isEmpty(resumeValue) then
    target:setSpinner(false)
    show_toast("Missing inputs", "Please enter your email and resume.")
    return
  end

  local emailStr = "" .. emailValue
  local resumeStr = "" .. resumeValue

  local payload = {
    email = emailStr,
    resume = resumeStr,
  }

  agents.ask(
    "resume_task_runner",
    payload,
    function(error, response)
      widget:onSubmitComplete(error, response)
    end
  )
end

function widget:onSubmitComplete(error, response)
  local target = self or widget
  if target == nil then
    print("[submit-resume-taskrunner.lua] widget reference missing; cannot handle onSubmitComplete")
    return
  end

  target:setSpinner(false)

  if error then
    show_toast("Submission failed", tostring(error))
    return
  end

  local submission = nil
  if type(response) == "table" then
    if response.result ~= nil and type(response.result) == "table" then
      submission = response.result
    elseif response.json ~= nil and type(response.json) == "table" then
      submission = response.json
    else
      submission = response
    end
  end

  if submission == nil then
    show_toast("Submission failed", "Task runner did not return a result.")
    return
  end

  local email = ""
  if submission.email ~= nil then
    email = tostring(submission.email)
  end
  show_toast("Resume submitted", "Logged resume for " .. email)
end
